languages.text: "Многомудрый поступок, шерин. Пускай невинные дети и родичи бунтаря гниют на дыбах в назидание еретикам. Клянусь Великим, твое имя будут поминать на Янусе с восторгом!"

traits.locale_text: "Отличный маневр, Вольный Торговец. Пускай невинные дети и родичи бунтаря гниют на дыбах в назидание еретиков. Уверена, твое имя будут поминать на Янусе с восторгом!"

languages.text: "What a sage decision, shereen. Let the rebels' innocent children and relatives rot on the rack as a lesson to all heretics. I swear to the Exalted One, your name will be fondly remembered on Janus!"
languages.original_text: "Многомудрый поступок, шерин. Пускай невинные дети и родичи бунтаря гниют на дыбах в назидание еретикам. Клянусь Великим, твое имя будут поминать на Янусе с восторгом!"

traits.locale_text: "An excellent move, Rogue Trader. Let the rebels' innocent children and relatives rot on the rack as a lesson to all heretics. I'm sure your name will be fondly remembered on Janus!"
"An excellent move, Rogue Trader. Let the rebels' innocent children and relatives rot on the rack as a lesson to all heretics. I'm sure your name will be fondly remembered on Janus!"
"An excellent move, Rogue Trader. Let the rebels' innocent children and relatives rot on the rack as a lesson to all heretics. I'm sure your name will be fondly remembered on Janus!"
"What a sage decision, shereen. Let the rebels' innocent children and relatives rot on the rack as a lesson to all heretics. I swear to the Exalted One, your name will be fondly remembered on Janus!"

languages.text: “多么明智的决定啊，亲爱的。让叛军士兵们无辜的亲人与孩子们的尸体在绞架上腐烂，以此作为给所有异端分子的教训。我向至高无上的神皇发誓，加努斯的每个人都会记住你的名字！”
languages.original_text: "What a sage decision, shereen. Let the rebels' innocent children and relatives rot on the rack as a lesson to all heretics. I swear to the Exalted One, your name will be fondly remembered on Janus!"

traits.locale_text: “多么明智的决定啊，亲爱的。让叛军士兵们无辜的亲人与孩子们的尸体在绞架上腐烂，以此作为给所有异端分子的教训。我向至高无上的神皇发誓，加努斯的每个人都会记住你的名字！”

languages.text: «Sabia decisión, shereen. Deja que los hijos y los familiares inocentes de los rebeldes se pudran para darles una lección a todos los herejes. ¡Por el Exaltado, juro que Janus recordará tu nombre con agradecimiento!».
languages.original_text: "What a sage decision, shereen. Let the rebels' innocent children and relatives rot on the rack as a lesson to all heretics. I swear to the Exalted One, your name will be fondly remembered on Janus!"

traits.locale_text: «Sabia decisión, shereen. Deja que los hijos y los familiares inocentes de los rebeldes se pudran para darles una lección a todos los herejes. ¡Por el Exaltado, juro que Janus recordará tu nombre con agradecimiento!».

languages.text: 「厳格な決定だねぇ、シャリーン。全異端者の見せしめに、反乱軍の無実な子供も親戚も苦しめて消耗させてみな。エグザルテッド・ワンに誓って、アンタの名前は親しみを込めてヤヌス住民に覚えてもらえるだろうね！」
languages.original_text: "What a sage decision, shereen. Let the rebels' innocent children and relatives rot on the rack as a lesson to all heretics. I swear to the Exalted One, your name will be fondly remembered on Janus!"

traits.locale_text: 「厳格な決定だねぇ、シャリーン。全異端者の見せしめに、反乱軍の無実な子供も親戚も苦しめて消耗させてみな。エグザルテッド・ワンに誓って、アンタの名前は親しみを込めてヤヌス住民に覚えてもらえるだろうね！」

languages.text: "Was für eine weise Entscheidung, Shereen. Lasst die unschuldigen Kinder und Verwandten der Rebellen auf der Folterbank verrotten, als Lektion für alle Ketzer. Ich schwöre zum Erhabenen, Euer Name wird auf Janus in guter Erinnerung bleiben!"
languages.original_text: "What a sage decision, shereen. Let the rebels' innocent children and relatives rot on the rack as a lesson to all heretics. I swear to the Exalted One, your name will be fondly remembered on Janus!"

traits.locale_text: "Was für eine weise Entscheidung, Shereen. Lasst die unschuldigen Kinder und Verwandten der Rebellen auf der Folterbank verrotten, als Lektion für alle Ketzer. Ich schwöre zum Erhabenen, Euer Name wird auf Janus in guter Erinnerung bleiben!"

languages.text: « Sage décision, shereen ! Quelle meilleure manière de donner une leçon à tous les hérétiques qu'en laissant les enfants et les proches des rebelles moisir sur le chevalet ? Vous pouvez être {mf|sûr|sûre} que Janus se souviendra affectueusement de votre nom ! »
languages.original_text: "What a sage decision, shereen. Let the rebels' innocent children and relatives rot on the rack as a lesson to all heretics. I swear to the Exalted One, your name will be fondly remembered on Janus!"

traits.locale_text: « Sage décision, shereen ! Quelle meilleure manière de donner une leçon à tous les hérétiques qu'en laissant les enfants et les proches des rebelles moisir sur le chevalet ? Vous pouvez être {mf|sûr|sûre} que Janus se souviendra affectueusement de votre nom ! »

languages.text: "Ne ferasetli bir karar şirinim. Tüm kâfirlere ibret olsun diye asilerin masum çocukları ile akrabalarına azap çektirmek, müthiş bir fikir. Görkemli'nin izniyle adın, Janus'ta sevgiyle anılacak!"
languages.original_text: "What a sage decision, shereen. Let the rebels' innocent children and relatives rot on the rack as a lesson to all heretics. I swear to the Exalted One, your name will be fondly remembered on Janus!"

traits.locale_text: "Ne ferasetli bir karar şirinim. Tüm kâfirlere ibret olsun diye asilerin masum çocukları ile akrabalarına azap çektirmek, müthiş bir fikir. Görkemli'nin izniyle adın, Janus'ta sevgiyle anılacak!"
